import Mathlib

open Filter

/-- If a real sequence `x` converges to `a` and `x n ‚â§ y n` for all `n`, then
`liminf x ‚â§ liminf y`. -/
theorem liminf_le_liminf_of_tendsto {x y : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {a : ‚Ñù} (h : Tendsto x atTop (ùìù a)) (hxy : ‚àÄ n, x n ‚â§ y n) :
  Filter.liminf x atTop ‚â§ Filter.liminf y atTop := by sorry

/-- If a real sequence `x` converges to `a` and `x n ‚â§ y n` for all `n`, then
`limsup x ‚â§ limsup y`. -/
theorem limsup_le_limsup_of_tendsto {x y : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {a : ‚Ñù} (h : Tendsto x atTop (ùìù a)) (hxy : ‚àÄ n, x n ‚â§ y n) :
  Filter.limsup x atTop ‚â§ Filter.limsup y atTop := by sorry
